AS.72: A chemical industry company (CAMBODIA)

Profile

The company is focusing on the development and production of building coatings, and the product directions are1. Water-based coating 2. Solvent base paint 3. Dry mixing mortar 4. Structural chemistry, etc. It’s worth $1 billion a year.

简介

该公司是一家专注于建筑涂料研制生产与开发的企业，产品方向

1.水基涂料2.溶剂基漆3.干混砂浆4.结构化学等。年产值10亿美元。

Business Interest

We need to explore, establish distribution channels in China, find new customers, or export to China. Look for investment capital to expand my business.

合作需求

希望在中国设立分销渠道，寻找新客户，或者向中国出口产品；寻求投资来扩大公司业务。

ABOUT US

Launched by the Global Alliance of SMEs (GASME), World Manufacturing Convention 2018 is co-hosted by Global Alliance of SMEs, United Nations Industrial Development Organization, Anhui Provincial Government, Chinese People’s Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries. This convention will kick off in Hefei in May 2018.

RECENT NEWS

  • WMC Preparation Meetings Were Held by Zhou Xi’an, Deputy Governor of Anhui Province 2018年5月8日
  • Anhui Marks 30-Day Countdown to the World Manufacturing Convention 2018年4月25日
  • Manufacturing Summit Set for Anhui Province in May 2018年4月19日
  • Inaugural World Manufacturing Convention to Kick off 2018年4月18日
  • Anhui Provincial Party Secretary Li Jinbin met with Former German President Christian Wulff 2017年6月19日
